thorwin.math.geo

Class Enu

  • java.lang.Object
    • thorwin.math.geo.Enu
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public final class Enu
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    East, North, Up coordinate system. This coordinate system defines a position on earth using a reference point (ECEF coordinate) and three relative coordinates (east, north and up) in meters.
    See Also:
    Ecef, Geodetic, Serialized Form
